/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $qsrq$ qsrq,$jsrq$ jsrq,nf,lbmc,lbdh,YF,jgs,yyjg/jgs jgpjjxgz,yyjg,zb from ( select t.nf,t.lbmc,t.lbdh,t.YF,t.jgs, case when t.jgs=0 then 0 else (t.YYJG/t.jgs) end jgpjjxgz, t.YYJG, case when t.qh=0 then 0 else round(cast(t.yyjg*100 as decimal(19,3))/cast(t.qh as decimal(19,3)),2) end zb from ( select y.nf,y.lbmc,y.lbdh,y.YF,y.YYJG,y.jgs, sum(y.YYJG) over(partition by y.NF,y.yf) qh from ( select l.NF,l.LBMC,l.LBDH,l.YF,count(l.JGKHDXDH) jgs,sum(l.YYJG) yyjg from ( select substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4) nf,csb.LBMC,jglb.lbdh,cy.JGKHDXDH, F_NUMTOCHAR(cast(substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2) as integer))||'月份' yf, sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from (select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as ym from csb_sjw where ym=tjrq and tjrq between $qsrq1$ and $jsrq1$ ) sjw inner join KHFA_YYJG_HY yyjg on sjw.YM=yyjg.TJRQ inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = yyjg.KHDXDH and $jsrq1$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JGLB jglb on jglb.KHDXDH = cy.JGKHDXDH and $jsrq1$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join CSB_JGLB csb on csb.LBDH=jglb.LBDH where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yyjg.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4),substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2),csb.LBMC,jglb.lbdh,cy.jgkhdxdh order by nf,yf,lbdh )l group by l.nf,l.lbmc,l.lbdh,l.yf)y )t where 1=1 and t.lbdh='$jglb$' union all
select t2.nf,t2.lbmc,t2.lbdh,'月份合计' YF,sum(t2.jgs) jgs,sum(t2.jgpjjxgz) jgpjjxgz,sum(t2.YYJG) yyjg, case when sum(t2.qh)=0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(t2.yyjg)*100 as decimal(19,3))/cast(sum(t2.qh) as decimal(19,3)),2) end zb from ( select t.nf,t.lbmc,t.lbdh,t.YF,t.jgs, case when t.jgs=0 then 0 else (t.YYJG/t.jgs) end jgpjjxgz, t.YYJG,t.qh, case when t.qh=0 then 0 else round(cast(t.yyjg*100 as decimal(19,3))/cast(t.qh as decimal(19,3)),2) end zb from ( select y.nf,y.lbmc,y.lbdh,y.YF,y.YYJG,y.jgs, sum(y.YYJG) over(partition by y.NF,y.yf) qh from ( select l.NF,l.LBMC,l.LBDH,l.YF,count(l.JGKHDXDH) jgs,sum(l.YYJG) yyjg from ( select substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4) nf,csb.LBMC,jglb.lbdh,cy.JGKHDXDH, F_NUMTOCHAR(cast(substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2) as integer))||'月份' yf, sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from (select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as ym from csb_sjw where ym=tjrq and tjrq between $qsrq1$ and $jsrq1$ ) sjw inner join KHFA_YYJG_HY yyjg on sjw.YM=yyjg.TJRQ inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = yyjg.KHDXDH and $jsrq1$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join KHDX_JGLB jglb on jglb.KHDXDH = cy.JGKHDXDH and $jsrq1$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join CSB_JGLB csb on csb.LBDH=jglb.LBDH where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yyjg.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4),substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2),csb.LBMC,jglb.lbdh,cy.jgkhdxdh order by nf,yf,lbdh )l group by l.nf,l.lbmc,l.lbdh,l.yf)y )t where 1=1 and t.lbdh='$jglb$' ) t2 group by t2.nf,t2.lbmc,t2.lbdh ) m order by m.yf
